amendment.description: Amendment temporarily classified medical bill payment delinquencies of up to 180 days as an extenuating circumstance which shall not interfere with parents' ability to receive PLUS loans for their children's tuition.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 110-590 to temporarily classify medical bill payment delinquencies of up to 180 days an extenuating circumstance which shall not interfere with parents' ability to receive PLUS loans for their children's tuition.
